name: Pharaoh + Cleopatra
description: Immerse yourself in Ancient Egypt from the age of the great pyramids to the final years of the New Kingdom.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 7 Compatible 3D Card DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible 3D Card DirectX: Version 9.0
